> [styromaniac](#comment_1814_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): This site isn't moderated. I would not seed it. 0net.io, I believe was taken down by authorities because of sites dedicated to CP on there. [...]

I DO NOT DEFEND PEDOPHILY OR ANY SHIT, I DO NOT DEFEND ANYONE, I DEFEND MY FREEDOM, because now you want to ban cp, then you want to ban music, then you want to ban film x or y, because company x or y, or government x or y NO LIKES IT.

Youtube started EXACTLY like that, banning something silly here and there and look what has become, neither I nor anyone will ban ANY content from big kopy kate 2, users who must block what they don't like or use the lists we have on zeronet, from people who keep posting shit, pedophilia and fucking for four.

BUT the site itself WILL NOT DO ANYTHING, besides adding the option of the USER individually to be able to ban the content FOR HIM and only him.

THERE IS NO HALF FREEDOM.

Either you have TOTAL freedom or you don't, and big kopy kate 2, has TOTAL access to ALL zeronet tools, the guy who is NOT liking a channel / video, can BLOCK the user in question, simple.
